mapper.update:
update ranking
matchId = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
matchDate = #{matchdate,jdbcType=DATE},
gameCode = #{gamecode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
matchIndex = #{matchindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mark = #{mark,jdbcType=BIGINT},
awardType = #{awardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
awardTotal = #{awardtotal,jdbcType=INTEGER},
insertTime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ddgroup = #{ddgroup,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ranking set matchId = #{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, matchDate = #{matchdate,jdbcType=DATE}, gameCode = #{gamecode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, matchIndex = #{matchindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ranking = #{ranking,jdbcType=BIGINT}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=BIGINT}, awardType = #{awardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, awardTotal = #{awardtotal,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insertTime = #{inserttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ddgroup = #{ddgroup,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ranking(id, matchId, matchDate, gameCode, matchIndex, uid, ranking, mark, awardType, awardTotal, insertTime,ddgroup) VALUES
(#{item.id},#{item.matchid},#{item.matchdate},#{item.gamecode},#{item.matchindex},#{item.uid}, #{item.ranking},#{item.mark},#{item.awardtype},#{item.awardtotal},#{item.inserttime},#{item.ddgroup})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ranking WHERE matchDate = #{matchdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND gameCode = #{gamecode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND matchId =#{matchid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND matchIndex = #{matchindex,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ddgroup = FALSE ORDER BY mark DESC
